I am a Ph.D. candidate in Economics at [Goethe University Frankfurt (GSEFM)](https://www.gsefm.eu/about-us.html). Currently, I am a research assistant at [Chair of Electronic Commerce (Prof. Bernd Skiera)](https://www.marketing.uni-frankfurt.de/en/professoren/skiera/chair-of-electronic-commerce.html) in Department of Marketing.

My research interests extensively focus on digital economics and economics of innovation. I am particularly interested in **innovative mechanisms** in digital infrastructure (e.g., blockchain, AI) and digital advertising.
